If this is false, inventory bar will auto-hide after 2 seconds and only the currently selected item will be shown.
fr: Toujours afficher la barre d'inventaire complète

default:
If inventory bar is always shown, "Use Item" button will
instantly use the item. If not, first press will select the
item, second press will use it.
remarks: Keep under 4 lines! Use real linebreaks (Ctrl-Enter) to add new lines, so that each line is under 60 characters
ru:
Если полоса инвентаря всегда включена, кнопка «Использовать
предмет» сразу использует его. В противном случае первое
нажатие выбирает предмет, а второе использует.
pt:
Se a barra de inventário estiver sempre mostrando, o botão
 "Usar item" funciona instantâneamente, caso contrário,
 pressionar uma vez selecionará o item, e a segunda vez irá usa-lo.
de:
"Gegenstand aktivieren" aktiviert Gegenstände sofort,
falls die ganze Inventarleiste angezeigt wird.
Falls nicht, werden Gegenstände beim ersten Drücken
ausgewählt und beim zweiten Drücken aktiviert.
esm:
Si la barra de inventario siempre se muestra, "Usar objeto"
usará el objeto de inmediato, de lo contrario, primero se
seleccionará y luego se usará.
fr:
Si la barre d'inventaire est toujours affichée, le bouton
"Utiliser l'objet" utilise instantanément l'objet. Sinon, la première
pression sélectionnera l'objet, la seconde l'utilisera.

default:
Note: Inventory bar will only appear in games/mods
that have items that can be placed in inventory
and used from it.
remarks: Keep under 4 lines! Use real linebreaks (Ctrl-Enter) to add new lines, so that each line is under 60 characters
ru:
Внимание: полоса инвентаря отображается, только если
в игре/моде есть предметы, которые можно использовать
из инвентаря.
pt:
Obs.: Barra de inventário aparece apenas em jogos/mods
 que têm itens que podem ser colocados no inventário.
de:
Beachte: Inventarleiste wird nur in Spielen/Mods
angezeigt, in denen Gegenstände vom Inventar aus
aktiviert werden können.
esm:
Nota: la barra solo aparecerá en juegos y mods que
contengan objetos de inventario utilizables.
fr:
Remarque : la barre d'inventaire n'apparaît que dans les
jeux/mods dont les objets peuvent être placés dans
l'inventaire et être utilisés à partir de celui-ci.

Примечание: мини-карта может вызывать проблемы с
производительностью на уровнях со сложной геометрией,

Obs.: O minimapa pode causar problemas de
desempenho em mapas complexos.
de:
Beachte: Minikarte kann Leistungseinbrüche auf Karten mit
komplexer Geometrie verursachen, insbesondere bei
niedrigem Zoom.
esm:
Nota: el minimapa puede causar pérdida de cuadros en
mapas complejos, especialmente con bajo zoom.
fr:
Remarque : la minimap peut entraîner des problèmes de
performance sur les cartes à géométrie complexe, en
particulier lorsque le zoom est faible. à géométrie
complexe, en particulier lorsque le zoom est faible.

fr: Minimap et affichage du radar à monstres

Possible value for "Minimap and enemy radar display" option
Possible value for "Minimap and enemy radar display" option
A 0.0-1.0 slider that determines the opacity of the minimap/radar background
A slider
Square or circle
A slider for the zoom value
General option for the minimap that determines which colors will be used. At 0 uses same colors as the automap, at 1 uses custom colors.
Option for "Minimap/radar color set". If this is set, the minimap will use the same colors as GZDoom's automap.
possible minimap shape
possible minimap shape

Whether to show enemies on the minimap. Possible options: Only alerted enemies / All enemies
This option becomes available when "Minimap and enemy radar display" is set either to "Enemy markers only" or "Minimap and enemy markers"
Option for "Show enemies on the minimap"
Option for "Show enemies on the minimap"
An option to choose the shape of enemy markers. Possible values: Arrow / Dot
Option for "Enemy markers shape"
Option for "Enemy markers shape"

A slider that determines the size of the enemy markers. At 0 (default) the markers are equal to the size of the monster and thus change their visual size according to the minimap's zoom value. At values above 0 they become fixed in size regardless of zoom.

default: Match the size of the object
remarks: The default value for "map markers size"
fr: Correspondre à la taille de l'objet

remarks:
Determines whether the cardinal direction letters (N, W, E, S) will be displayed on the minimap.
Possible values: Off / Along a circular trajectory / Along the minimap's edge
The cardinal direction letters will always rotate along a circle, even if the minimap is set to use the square shape
The cardinal direction letters will slide along the minimap's edge, either in a circular or square bounding box, depending on the currently used minimap's shape.
pt: Ao redor da borda do minimapa
fr: Le long du bord de la minimap

remarks: A color picker that determines the color of the N W E S letters on the minimap
A slider that determines the size of the cardinal direction letters (N, W, E, S) on the minimap.
A subtitle for a minimap menu section where you control things like "Undiscovered lines opacity" and the colors of the lines
DEPRECATED
Replacement for "Display undiscovered lines" option: now this is a 0.0-1.0 slider that determines the translucency of the lines that the player hasn't seen yet.
On/off: whether to display lines that are at the edges of the sectors with different floor heights

remarks: Title for the Presets submenu

Translate as a verb (probably in infinitive form)

This is one of the actions in a submenu that appears when you click on a preset.
After that it's used as a verb and inserted in the follwing message:

Are you sure you want to <verb> preset "presetname"?

Translate as a verb (probably in infinitive form)

This is one of the actions in a submenu that appears when you click on a preset.
After that it's used as a verb and inserted in the follwing message:

Are you sure you want to <verb> preset "presetname"?

Translate as a verb (probably in infinitive form)

This is one of the actions in a submenu that appears when you click on a preset.
After that it's used as a verb and inserted in the follwing message:

Are you sure you want to <verb> preset "presetname"?

Button to leave the Presets menu. Comes after options to load/overwrite/delete, so please user lowercase for this one as well.
The meaning is "return to previous menu and do nothing", so this can also be translated as "back"

default: Are you sure you want to %1s preset \"%2s\"?
remarks:
%1s is "load" or "overwrite" or "delete"
%2s is the name of the preset given by the user, so it's not affected by grammar

These string tags can be moved around, but make sure that their numbers stay in the same place (e.g. if %2s needs to be placed before %1s, the numbers do NOT change).

Don't forget the escape character \ for quotation marks. Alternative, you can use 'single' quotation marks, they don't require an escape character.
pt: Tem certeza que quer %1s a predefinição \"%2s\"?
de: Bist du sicher, dass du die Voreinstellung \"%2s\" %1s möchtest?

remarks:
Generic warning for the Presets menu
%s is the name of the preset given by the user, so it's not affected by grammar
Generic warning for the Presets menu
ru: В названии пресета не должно быть пробелов
pt: Nome da predefinição não pode conter espaço em branco
de: Name der Voreinstellung darf keine Leerzeichen enthalten
esm: Nombre de la configuración no puede tener espacios
fr: Le nom de la présélection ne peut pas contenir d'espace

default: Cannot create preset with empty name
remarks: Generic warning for the Presets menu
ru: Нельзя создать пресет с пустым названием
pt: Não é possível criar predefinições com um nome em branco
de: Leerer Name für Voreinstellungen nicht möglich
esm: No se puede crear configuración con nombre en blanco
fr: Impossible de créer un préréglage avec un nom vide

remarks: Title of a submenu in the Presets menu. Built-in presets are the presets that are included into FlexiHUD
Title of a submenu in the Presets menu. User presets are the ones created by the player.
Command in the Presets menu that saves the current settings into a preset

default: Are you sure you want to reset to default settings?
remarks: This just resets all CVARs to their default values. This isn't tied to a preset.
pt: Tem certeza que quer voltar para os padrões de fábrica?
de: Bist du sicher, dass du die Standardeinstellung wiederherstellen möchtest?
esm: Quieres reiniciar a las configuraciones por defecto?
fr: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir rétablir les paramètres par défaut ?

default: Are you sure you want to load the default preset?
remarks: DEPRECATED
ru: Вы точно хотите загрузить пресет по умолчанию?
pt: Tem certeza que quer carregar a predefinição padrão?
de: Bist du sicher, dass du die Standard-Voreinstellung laden möchtest?
fr: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir charger le préréglage par défaut ?

remarks: When the user chooses "Save current preset", this line appears, followed by a text input field where the user has to enter the name for their current preset.
A button the player presses after they've entered the preset name.
Built-in preset name. This preset only displays the minimap and hides everything else.
Built-in preset name. This preset only displays the directional incoming damage markers and nothing else.

Built-in preset name. This preset only displays the minimap, hitmarkers, incoming damage markers, custom items and an all ammo block, but doesn't display health, current weapon/ammo, weapon slots, or powerup timers.

Built-in preset name. This preset is arranged at the bottom, kinda similar to the classic statusbar. It also uses opaque textured background. Doesn't show the minimap.
Could also be translated similar to "retro", "vanilla-like", "classic look", etc.

Built-in preset name. This is a minimalistic preset that shows no background, no current weapon icon, no minimap; health/armor are displayed as numbers (not bars) and is mostly arranged at the bottom center.

Built-in preset name. This is a bright-green preset where bars around the crosshair are very large (in the style of GoldenEye), and weapon slots are on the right, below the minimap (which is in top right and set to "monster markers only" mode).
